StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_GetShipQuotaRqmtForMCRC]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@FiscalYear int AS
SET NOCOUNT ON
DECLARE @FYBeginDate DATETIME DECLARE @FYEndDate DATETIME
SET @FYBeginDate = '10/1/' + CONVERT(VARCHAR, CONVERT(INT, @FiscalYear) - 1) SET @FYEndDate = '9/30/' + CONVERT(VARCHAR, CONVERT(INT, @FiscalYear) )
SELECT SQP.ORGANIZATION_ID, SQP.CATEGORY_CODE, SQP.QUOTA_VALUE, SQP.REQMT_VALUE, RO_REG.SHORT_NAME FROM RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION RO_REG INNER JOIN SHIPPING_QUOTA_PLAN SQP ON RO_REG.ORGANIZATION_ID = SQP.ORGANIZATION_ID INNER JOIN MONTH_CODE MC ON SQP.MONTH_CODE = MC.MONTH_CODE WHERE SQP.FISCAL_YEAR = @FiscalYear AND MC.MONTH_CODE = 0 AND RO_REG.ORGANIZATION_TYPE = 'R' ORDER BY SQP.ORGANIZATION_ID, SQP.CATEGORY_CODE
